job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Title:Â Software Engineer- Wallets teamLocation: RemoteDuration: PERMJob Description:What you'll work on:Design and develop resilient and scalable solutions that receive, custody, and broadcast digital assets for millions of users across all major blockchain networksWork on critical, high-value software for the client crypto currency exchangeSolve complex problems unique to the crypto currency space that use applied cryptography and strict security protocolsWork with modern, state-of-the-art software development, including CI/CD, infrastructure as code, containers, and microservices architectureWork with a diverse set of languages and frameworks, including Java microservices, TypeScript, Python, a suite of AWS services, and various databasesMentor and train other engineers using your expertise in software developmentBe an integral member of an agile software engineering team using SCRUM methodologyWhat you'll bring:5+ years designing software and coding professionallyComputer Science degree preferredAn interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency spaceProficient with JavaProficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHPComfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is requiredExperience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in JavaCapable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to productionBroad knowledge of SQL and relational database designSome knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curvesAn eye for detailStrong communication skills with the ability to explain complex problems and concepts to people of all levels of expertiseA passion for learning and sharing what you learnComfort and experience shifting gears quickly, learning on the fly, and working on an evolving product without having all of the answers
